messages.message: @Heymian Their requirement is how they can encrypt data on IB and then move it to another platform…. do we have any encryption  methods for this?

can they clarify a bit more, what does move it to another platform mean? When we encrypt it, we use our own encrypted format. You will only be able to make sense of it through our platform. If they move it elsewhere, they won’t be able to make sense of the bytes unless they re-implement our code for deserializing the payload.

so - they need to move files that have been pickled and are on the IB platform - so a new environment (AWS) to train off IB, as we cannot support the training on our platform due to the size of the classification problem. As it is customer data they need to ensure this data is encrypted when they move it
